1. Free throw Freddy is a 80% shooter which means the probability that he makes a shot is 0.8. Suppose he takes 18 shots during a game. 

a. How many shots should he expect to make?

b. Find the probability that he makes more shots than expected.

c. Find the probability that he makes between 12 and 15 shots  (inclusive).
